Title: Four not-having-to-bend scrolls (1, 2)
Designer: Nanhui District Spare Time Art Group (南汇县业余美术创作组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: For centuries, rice cultivation was manual labor. Farmers had to stand in the water, bent over, to look after the rice plants. Mechanization brings this to an end.(First of two sheets; the second is BG E15/104).
